biosimulators_pyneuroml.cli package¶

Submodules¶

biosimulators_pyneuroml.cli.brian2 module¶

BioSimulators-compliant command-line interface to the Brian 2 simulation program.

Date

2021-05-28

2021, BioSimulators Team
